# ReplaceTextOptions.FromPositionToRightMargin property

Gets a default replace text options, sets strategy as current position to right margin.

```csharp
public static ReplaceTextOptions FromPositionToRightMargin { get; }
```

## Property Value

A [`ReplaceTextOptions`](../ReplaceTextOptions.md) instance that contains the default value of replace text options.
